entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 p.m. PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 24.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 1:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 24.1°C

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 34 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High 29. Humidex 31. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
